# Readme Generator
  ## Description
  It generates a readme document based on the user's input.

  [![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)

  ## Installation
  NODE.js is required as well as npm inquirer.
